mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.orgs AS "orgs", a.contractor AS "contractor", a.sponsors AS "sponsors", a.des AS "des", a.starttime AS "starttime", a.endtime AS "endtime", a.regstarttime AS "regstarttime", a.regendtime AS "regendtime", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.address AS "address", a.contacts AS "contacts", a.phone AS "phone", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_match( id, name, orgs, contractor, sponsors, des, starttime, endtime, regstarttime, regendtime, createtime, updatetime, address, contacts, phone, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{orgs}, #{contractor}, #{sponsors}, #{des}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{regstarttime}, #{regendtime}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{address}, #{contacts}, #{phone}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bisai_match SET name = #{name}, orgs = #{orgs}, contractor = #{contractor}, sponsors = #{sponsors}, des = #{des}, starttime = #{starttime}, endtime = #{endtime}, regstarttime = #{regstarttime}, regendtime = #{regendtime}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, address = #{address}, contacts = #{contacts}, phone = #{phone}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
